trans-unit.source: Fruitcake Elemental
trans-unit.target: Fruitcake Elemental

trans-unit.source: Fruitcake Elemental is indestructible. At the end of your turn, Fruitcake Elemental deals 7 damage to you. {3}: Target player gains control of Fruitcake Elemental.
trans-unit.target: Fruitcake Elemental is indestructible. At the end of your turn, Fruitcake Elemental deals 7 damage to you. {3}: Target player gains control of Fruitcake Elemental.

trans-unit.source: Experiments intended to create the perfect holiday emissary resulted in a substance harder than darksteel and a fraction as merry.
trans-unit.target: Experiments intended to create the perfect holiday emissary resulted in a substance harder than darksteel and a fraction as merry.

trans-unit.source: Gifts Given
trans-unit.target: Gifts Given

trans-unit.source: Search target opponent's library for four cards with different names and reveal them. That player chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into the player's graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then that player shuffles their library.
trans-unit.target: Search target opponent's library for four cards with different names and reveal them. That player chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into the player's graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then that player shuffles their library.

trans-unit.source: "Thanks! You shouldn't have."
trans-unit.target: "Thanks! You shouldn't have."

trans-unit.source: Evil Presents
trans-unit.target: Evil Presents

trans-unit.source: Put a creature card from your hand into play under target opponent's control. That creature attacks each turn if able... and always attacks its controller.
trans-unit.target: Put a creature card from your hand into play under target opponent's control. That creature attacks each turn if able... and always attacks its controller.

trans-unit.source: 'Tis better to give than to receive.

trans-unit.source: Season's Beatings
trans-unit.target: Season's Beatings

trans-unit.source: Family gathering — Each creature target player controls deals damage equal to its power to another random creature that player controls.
trans-unit.target: Family gathering — Each creature target player controls deals damage equal to its power to another random creature that player controls.

trans-unit.source: Arriving home, he suddenly longed for the bloodsoaked battlefields behind him.
trans-unit.target: Arriving home, he suddenly longed for the bloodsoaked battlefields behind him.

trans-unit.source: Snow Mercy
trans-unit.target: Snow Mercy

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, put a globe counter on it. {T}, {Q}, {T}, {Q}, {T}: Tap all creatures with globe counters on them.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, put a globe counter on it. {T}, {Q}, {T}, {Q}, {T}: Tap all creatures with globe counters on them.

trans-unit.source: WARNING: Shake gently. Contents may cause choking, hypothermia, and/or planar invasion.
trans-unit.target: WARNING: Shake gently. Contents may cause choking, hypothermia, and/or planar invasion.

trans-unit.source: Yule Ooze
trans-unit.target: Yule Ooze

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy another nonland permanent chosen at random, then put a number of +1/+1 counters on Yule Ooze equal to that permanent's converted mana cost. {R}{G}, Eat some food: Regenerate Yule Ooze.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy another nonland permanent chosen at random, then put a number of +1/+1 counters on Yule Ooze equal to that permanent's converted mana cost. {R}{G}, Eat some food: Regenerate Yule Ooze.

trans-unit.source: It loves having family for dinner.
trans-unit.target: It loves having family for dinner.

trans-unit.source: Naughty
trans-unit.target: Naughty

trans-unit.source: Search another target player's library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle that player's library.
trans-unit.target: Search another target player's library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle that player's library.

trans-unit.source: Nice

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card and put it into another target player's hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a card and put it into another target player's hand. Then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.source: Stocking Tiger
trans-unit.target: Stocking Tiger

trans-unit.source: Stocking Tiger enters the battlefield with a sealed Magic booster pack under it. When Stocking Tiger deals combat damage to a player, unwrap the booster pack and put it into your hand.
trans-unit.target: Stocking Tiger enters the battlefield with a sealed Magic booster pack under it. When Stocking Tiger deals combat damage to a player, unwrap the booster pack and put it into your hand.

trans-unit.source: Just hope yours isn't full of coal golems.

trans-unit.resname: HHO·14 | Mishra's Toy Workshop | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mishra's Toy Workshop
trans-unit.target: Mishra's Toy Workshop

trans-unit.resname: HHO·14 | Mishra's Toy Workshop | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. Spend this mana only on spells and abilities that put tokens onto the battlefield. Use toys to represent the tokens.

trans-unit.resname: HHO·14 | Mishra's Toy Workshop | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Even though Urza tried to apologize, Mishra continued to bear a grudge.
trans-unit.target: Even though Urza tried to apologize, Mishra continued to bear a grudge.

trans-unit.resname: HHO·15 | Goblin Sleigh Ride | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Goblin Sleigh Ride
trans-unit.target: Goblin Sleigh Ride

trans-unit.resname: HHO·15 | Goblin Sleigh Ride | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control climbs into Goblin Sleigh Ride. You slide them on their merry way. If the creature stayed on, it deals damage equal to its toughness to each other creature touched during the slide.
trans-unit.target: Target creature you control climbs into Goblin Sleigh Ride. You slide them on their merry way. If the creature stayed on, it deals damage equal to its toughness to each other creature touched during the slide.

trans-unit.resname: HHO·15 | Goblin Sleigh Ride | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "What fun it is to ride and sing a slaying song tonight!"
trans-unit.target: "What fun it is to ride and sing a slaying song tonight!"

trans-unit.resname: HHO·16 | Thopter Pie Network | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thopter Pie Network
trans-unit.target: Thopter Pie Network

trans-unit.resname: HHO·16 | Thopter Pie Network | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you're eating, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Use food to represent the token. Whenever a creature token you control dies, if it's represented by food, eat it.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you're eating, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Use food to represent the token. Whenever a creature token you control dies, if it's represented by food, eat it.

trans-unit.resname: HHO·16 | Thopter Pie Network | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: They all thought her dream was just pie in the sky.
trans-unit.target: They all thought her dream was just pie in the sky.

trans-unit.source: Some Disassembly Required
trans-unit.target: Some Disassembly Required

trans-unit.resname: HHO·17 | Some Disassembly Required | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Distribute the sacrificed creature's keyword abilities among any number of other target creatures until end of turn. If it's December, you gain 1 life for each of those keywords.
trans-unit.target: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Distribute the sacrificed creature's keyword abilities among any number of other target creatures until end of turn. If it's December, you gain 1 life for each of those keywords.

trans-unit.resname: HHO·17 | Some Disassembly Required | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Now all they needed was a jolly, happy soul.
trans-unit.target: Now all they needed was a jolly, happy soul.

trans-unit.source: Bog Humbugs
trans-unit.target: Bog Humbugs

trans-unit.source: Flying Whenever Bog Humbugs deals combat damage, hum that many notes of a festive song. If you can, put a +1/+1 counter on Bog Humbugs.
trans-unit.target: Flying Whenever Bog Humbugs deals combat damage, hum that many notes of a festive song. If you can, put a +1/+1 counter on Bog Humbugs.

trans-unit.source: Decorated Knight
trans-unit.target: Decorated Knight

trans-unit.source: Whenever Decorated Knight attacks, draw a card from your original deck if it's outside the game.
trans-unit.target: Whenever Decorated Knight attacks, draw a card from your original deck if it's outside the game.

trans-unit.source: Present Arms
trans-unit.target: Present Arms

trans-unit.source: Exchange your library with another deck you own from outside the game. Shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: Exchange your library with another deck you own from outside the game. Shuffle your library.

trans-unit.resname: HHO·20 | Topdeck the Halls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Topdeck the Halls
trans-unit.target: Topdeck the Halls

trans-unit.resname: HHO·20 | Topdeck the Halls | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Decorated cards in your hand have miracle {S}. (Decorated cards include premiums, promos, and cards with alternate frames or art.) At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twelve or more decorated permanents, you win the game.
trans-unit.target: Decorated cards in your hand have miracle {S}. (Decorated cards include premiums, promos, and cards with alternate frames or art.) At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twelve or more decorated permanents, you win the game.

trans-unit.source: Last-Minute Chopping
trans-unit.target: Last-Minute Chopping

trans-unit.source: Ask target opponent if they remembered to get you a present. If they say yes, they put a card they own from outside the game into your hand. Otherwise, you gain control of target permanent they control.
trans-unit.target: Ask target opponent if they remembered to get you a present. If they say yes, they put a card they own from outside the game into your hand. Otherwise, you gain control of target permanent they control.

trans-unit.source: "Dear brother, I couldn't forget you if I tried, and I *have* tried."
trans-unit.target: "Dear brother, I couldn't forget you if I tried, and I *have* tried."

trans-unit.source: Chaos Wrap
trans-unit.target: Chaos Wrap

trans-unit.source: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library. Then they may look at the top card of their library and may wrap it. If it's a permanent card, they may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, they may put it onto the battlefield face down as a 4/4 red Present creature. (To wrap a card, put it inside lots of sleeves. If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a sleeve from it instead.)
trans-unit.target: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library. Then they may look at the top card of their library and may wrap it. If it's a permanent card, they may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, they may put it onto the battlefield face down as a 4/4 red Present creature. (To wrap a card, put it inside lots of sleeves. If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a sleeve from it instead.)

trans-unit.source: Seasonal Sequels
trans-unit.target: Seasonal Sequels

trans-unit.source: Pitch the titles of up to X holiday-themed sequels to target spell. Copy that spell for each title pitched, except the copy has that name. You may choose new targets for the copies. (Simply adding numbers isn't festive enough.)
trans-unit.target: Pitch the titles of up to X holiday-themed sequels to target spell. Copy that spell for each title pitched, except the copy has that name. You may choose new targets for the copies. (Simply adding numbers isn't festive enough.)

trans-unit.source: NOW SHOWING: *Sword of Hearth and Home Alone*, *Eight Crazy Knights' Charge*, *Holiday Incinerate*, and *Phyrexian Gremlins*.
trans-unit.target: NOW SHOWING: *Sword of Hearth and Home Alone*, *Eight Crazy Knights' Charge*, *Holiday Incinerate*, and *Phyrexian Gremlins*.
